QuestData.Title: Ghaliri
QuestData.Description: Priestess is not very good at speaking Common, no.$b$bMaybe you go speak with Ghaliri, in front of that tent.$b$bTell him about what you've seen inside Zul'Gurub, yes.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Ghaliri at Fort Livingston in Northern Stranglethorn.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Ghaliri at Fort Livingston in Northern Stranglethorn.
QuestData.RewardText: <You explain to Ghaliri what has happened up to this point.>$b$bIt would seem that Jin'do has survived, and he is rallying his brothers to once again summon Hakkar into this world. It was good of you to come to speak with me.$b$bThere is not much we can do now but to wait, and watch. Jin'do is weak, and prime for striking, but I must wait for word from Rastakhan before issuing orders. Until then, you and your raptor will have to wait.
